Jakobi 2, IV korrus
51005 Tartu linn,

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: To provide an overview on the history and also currents trends in the studies of Finnish language, as well as linguistic situation in Finland. This includes different disciplines, language policies and research.
description.et: Antakse ülevaade soome keele uurimise senistest suundadest, uurimisasutustest, uurijatest, meetoditest ja tulemustest.

objectives.en: To provide an overview on the history and also currents trends in the studies of Finnish language, as well as linguistic situation in Finland.
objectives.et: Antakse ülevaade soome keele uurimise senistest suundadest, uurimisasutustest, uurijatest, meetoditest ja tulemustest.

learning_outcomes.en: The student will be aware of history of Finnish, old written Finnish, dialects, and their academic research as well as the current research interest.
learning_outcomes.et: Üliõpilane tunneb soome keele ajaloo, murrete, vana kirjakeele ja teiste nähtuste iseloomu ja nende teaduslikku uurimust, uurimislugu ja aktuaalseid uurimisteemasid.
